EmailTemplate.name: If there is no contract (1350423694.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: If there is no contract (1350423694.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear Lucio , As we discussed, you decided to not have a formal contract between MBO Partners and your Client. If you can please review and sign this acknowledgement form <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Contract_Acknowledgement_Form.pdf>, we’ll keep this for our records. Best regards, Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
